channel.title: Dementhium Banking
channel.description: There's a problem where if you have already max cash or max value of any item in your bank (2147m) that if you add anymore money into it, the money just disapears. Is there a way to make it so it only drains to match the 2147m in the bank, then it says your bank is full or something so you don't lose money?

item.title: Dementhium Banking
item.dc:creator: @MsSummer MsSummer
item.description:
@MsSummer wrote:

how would i do that? lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Dementhium Banking
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

Yeah. Add a check. If you have 2147483647 in your bank, send a message and return.

Read full topic
